dict.acceptation: 训练；使有纪律；处罚；使有条理；
训练；纪律；学科；符合行为准则的行为（或举止）；

sent.orig: Has 6 doctorate authorization level discipline, 53 doctorate authorization discipline, 65 master's degree authorization discipline.
sent.trans: 拥有6个博士学位授权一级学科，53个博士学位授权学科，65个硕士学位授权学科。

sent.orig: It is not only organizational discipline that is weaker than before, so is political discipline.
sent.trans: 现在不只是组织纪律差，政治纪律也差。

sent.orig: Metals are a discipline, composites are a brand-new discipline.
sent.trans: 金属，是一门复杂的学科，而复合材料则是一门全新的学科。

sent.orig: The discipline evaluation criterion of higher education concerns the ownership of discipline of higher education.
sent.trans: 高等教育学学科评价标准关系到高等教育的学科归属。

sent.orig: Slowly, they have worked their way into the higher echelons of discipline after discipline.
sent.trans: 渐渐地她们已经加入了各个学科的最高一级的梯队里。
